Mantella: Wow! Back with Megatron and that dweeb Quickstrike I couldn't even
eat an apple without his permison. But our room! This should go along fine.
What do you think Shredder?
----- Original Message -----
From: <Dachande85@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 25, 2000 8:22 PM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Bazooka::
>
>     Bazooka led Shredder and Mantella down the corridor. He really wanted
to
> make idle conversation to interrupt the silence.
>     Soon they reached the quarter section of the base. He walked up to a
door
> and pressed a button. The door opened. Inside was the basics, a bed, a
desk,
> with a computer, a weapons rack, and a few shelves. He went across the
hall
> and opened the another door. Inside was the same layout. Both had windows,
> but were covered with rock.
>     "You may pick either room, they are exactly the same." Bazooka said to
> them both. "Magmatron has granted you access to most of the ship, you may
> explore at your will. He has also requested that you report to the lab in
20
> cycles. Which gives you plenty of time to get aquatinted with you new
home."
>     Bazooka left them to their exploring.
>
>
>
>
